S1Freight vehicles conforming to the W6A
profile and above 3650mm in height are
prohibited in both directions between
Elsecar & Wombwell stations.
The Rail Head Treatment Train FEA wagon
is permitted without restriction.
The MPV with Clayton water tank module
fitted is prohibited in both directions between
Elsecar & Wombwell stations. The MPV
without the Clayton water tank module is
restricted to 5mph through Bridge No. 57 at
170m 40ch on the Up line, and 5mph
through Bridge No. 51 at 169m 50ch on the
Down line.
